author: ddewolf
msg: New JSPs for new Testsuite portlet.  The testsuite portlet has been enhanced.  Testing logic - where possible - has been moved into test classes for less scripting, easier maintenence, and to model best practices a little better.  Additional tests have been added.

author: ddewolf
msg: Adding images for new portlet look and feel.  Layout changed to look cleaner and so that failure may be easily detected.
